Plus, it has side hatches and a cargo compartment with a weapons cabinet, a mini-figure sized freezing chamber and a detachable escape pod. Check out more Star Wars gifts here.

LEGO Marvel Infinity Gauntlet Set

For the Lounger

Parachute Waffle Robe

Perfect for the shower or day-long lounging, this waffle robe brings the spa experience to the home. The classic silhouette is made out of the lightweight and ultra-soft textures that Parachute is known for, featuring two hip pockets and a simple waist tie.

Bombas Saturday Slipper

Slippers are a can’t-go-wrong gift for nearly anyone on your list, and these brand new and adorable sherpa-lined pair from Bombas come in several hues like this Bright Tomato and a more subtle Sandy Cove.

For the Lifelong Learner

MasterClass Subscription

MasterClass’s expert-taught courses run a swath through every industry, meaning you’ll be able to find something for everyone on your list this year, from chefs and musicians to filmmakers and novelists. Film buffs can take a class taught by James Cameron and Spike Lee, while composers can learn from the likes of Yo-Yo Ma and Alicia Keys. For more class options, check out Variety’s roundup of the best MasterClass courses.

Rosetta Stone

For someone who has expressed wanting to learn a new language or is simply planning for an international trip, Rosetta Stone is the way to go. All Rosetta Stone’s plans offer bite-sized lessons available online and offline; it’s a fully immersive environment for long-lasting learning, with leading speech recognition technology to perfect your accent. The unlimited lifetime subscription boasts the best value, with access to the program’s full roster of 25 languages (and counting) forever.

Headspace

If the new Netflix series inspired you to prioritize mindfulness, then there’s no better place to start than with the best. There are few people. who wouldn’t do well for some meditation and stress relief after the past two years. Headspace is one of the best ways for beginners to get into meditation, with hundreds of meditation guides and courses, sleep hacks, wake-up routines and more. If you know someone who could clear their mind, a Headspace subscription is the perfect gift, especially with their special holiday promo that knocks down the annual price by $30.
